clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Safety and Efficacy of the AnapnoGuard 100 System
clinical_study.official_title: The Safety of Using the AnapnoGuard 100 System in Intubated Critical Care Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of using the AnapnoGuard 100 system during the course of mechanical ventilation and intubation of critical care patients in Intensive Care Unit.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of AE (adverse events) and SAE (serious adverse events)
primary_outcome.time_frame: participants will be followed for the entire duration of intubation (an expected average of 8 days)

arm_group.description: Patients intubated with AnapnoGuard EndoTracheal Tube and connected to the AnapnoGuard 100 Control System
Patients intubated with the Standard of Care EndoTracheal Tube and Connected to a Suction Regulator
